summary: The diff updates the header logo in frontend/src/App.tsx to a new PNG path, but it does not provide evidence that the footer logo (or any other logo render locations) were updated, nor that the old logo path is fully removed. The diff also includes changes to metadata/state summary files that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the currently used BidArena logo image with the user-provided logo asset, ensuring the updated logo appears everywhere the logo is rendered (at minimum: the header logo and the footer logo).
missing_requirements.reason: Only the header update is visible in the truncated App.tsx diff; there is no evidence in the provided diff summary that the footer logo was updated to the user-provided asset.

missing_requirements.requirement: No remaining tags in the app reference the old logo path "/assets/generated/bidarena-logo.dim_512x512.png" unless the user-provided logo is intentionally placed at that same path/filename.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not show a complete search/replace or removal of the old logo path across the app. Because App.tsx is truncated and other files are not shown, it cannot be confirmed that no tags still reference the old path.

hallucinated_features.description: Updating project state/metadata (project_state.json) unrelated to replacing the logo asset.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-9 only requests swapping the logo asset references; changing project_state.json is not part of the stated requirements or acceptance criteria.
REQ-9 does not request changes to documentation/summary files; only the logo replacement behavior is requested.
